Name: Intuition
Text: Search your library for three cards and reveal them. Target opponent chooses one. Put that card into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. Then shuffle.

Name: Argothian Enchantress
Text: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)\nWhenever you cast an enchantment spell, draw a card.

Name: Living Death
Text: Each player exiles all creature cards from their graveyard, then sacrifices all creatures they control, then puts all cards they exiled this way onto the battlefield.
